title: Main Aur Mr. Riight
plot: A light hearted take on love, relationships and singlehood.
synopsis:
As the title speaks for itself, the film is about finding The Mr. /Miss Right.
But does one really exist?A slice of life, romantic comedy that talks about love, relationships and single hood. Its a story of 8 friends from different fields living their individual and successful lives. The story sails through each and everyones life of which the major plot being that of Aliya & Sukhi. Aliya , a casting director lives a crazy life spending day after day screen testing struggling actors. But this time due to circumstances she is casting for the role of a lifetime, her Boyfriend. She casts struggling actor Sukhi to enact the role of her boyfriend. Aliya faces the challenge of turning Sukhi from a loud and immature punjabi jatt boy to sophisticated MR.RIGHT, Sukhi on the other hand with his charm and persona changes Aliya and her friends lives completely. In short it raises a question for all the individuals in the world, on the sheer existence of their Mr. / Miss Right.
